Skyzdalimit Omagh is a cross-community performing arts charity for people with a learning/physical disability, sensory/visual impairment and non-disabled peers.

404 All Productions

Coming Soon

Circus the Musical

Starring Kerri Quinn and Ryan Tracey, Circus the Musical is an immersive show for all the family that is inspired by the Greatest Showman.

Our Mission

Our mission is to transform societyâ€™s attitudes to learning disability and improve the quality of life of people with a learning disability and enable them to achieve their full potential in performing and life.

Our Vision

Our vision is a world where people with a learning disability/autism are valued equally, listened to and valued.

Our Values

  • We are Caring. We treat everyone with respect and kindness.
  • We are Positive. We never stop believing in a better future and we celebrate what we are proud of now.
  • We are honest, open, fair and accountable.
